name: part_006
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ1stソロライブ】常闇トワ 1stソロライブ ＂Break your ×××＂【無料チラ見せ】 [WlSJEyV6Emw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Opening sequence for Tokoyami Towa's 1st Solo Live 'Break your ×××', featuring dynamic lighting and countdown visuals.
Tokoyami Towa appears on stage and greets the audience at the start of her performance.
Tokoyami Towa performs the song 'Hime' with intense choreography and laser effects.
MC section where Tokoyami Towa addresses the audience after the first song, expressing her nervousness and excitement.

subtitles.original: 聞かせて
subtitles.english: Let me hear it

subtitles.original: みんなー！今日は常闇トワ 1st ソロライブに来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you for coming to Tokoyami Towa's 1st Solo Live today!

subtitles.original: 最後まで盛り上がっていくぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's keep this energy up until the very end!

subtitles.original: 爪を磨いたなら　まだ子供のようなあなたの為に
subtitles.english: Once I've polished my nails, for you who are still like a child

subtitles.original: あぁ　試したいのなら　そう愚かな手に手錠をかけて
subtitles.english: Ah, if you want to test me, then put handcuffs on those foolish hands

subtitles.original: 常世の闇に囚われたまま　甘い眩暈が胸を噛んでて
subtitles.english: Still trapped in the darkness of the underworld, a sweet dizziness gnaws at my chest

subtitles.original: 幾つもの後悔を　捧げて
subtitles.english: Offering up countless regrets

subtitles.original: さりげない合図に隠れた　答えはすぐに分からせてあげる
subtitles.english: The answer hidden in a casual sign, I'll let you know right away

subtitles.original: 微睡に塗れた　拒んだままに　受け止めてあげる
subtitles.english: Drowned in a daze, I will accept you just as you are, refusing me

subtitles.original: ほら　悲鳴を聞かせて
subtitles.english: Now, let me hear your scream

subtitles.original: じゃあ　指を鳴らしたなら　こねこねこのような私の為に
subtitles.english: Then, if I snap my fingers, for me who's like a kitten

subtitles.original: あぁ　喉が渇いたわ　薄紅の口に指を散らして
subtitles.english: Ah, my throat is parched, scattering fingers on my light crimson lips

subtitles.original: 狭い牢屋に閉じ込めたまま　首輪に繋がれたいの
subtitles.english: Still locked in a narrow cage, I want to be tethered by a collar

subtitles.original: 下らないルールじゃ奪えない　自由は既にこの手の中に有る
subtitles.english: Foolish rules cannot take it away, freedom is already in these hands

subtitles.original: 愛情では測れない　狂ったままに選ばせてあげる
subtitles.english: It cannot be measured by love, I will let you choose in your madness

subtitles.original: ほら　ここを灼いて
subtitles.english: Now, sear this place

subtitles.original: 分からないふりをして　寝惚けてるの？
subtitles.english: Are you pretending not to know, half-asleep?

subtitles.original: もっと熱い暗闇を見せて　ねぇ
subtitles.english: Show me an even hotter darkness, hey

subtitles.original: さりげない合図に隠れた　答えはすぐに分からせてあげる
subtitles.english: The answer hidden in a casual sign, I'll let you know right away

subtitles.original: 微睡に塗れた　拒んだままに　受け止めてあげる
subtitles.english: Drowned in a daze, I will accept you just as you are, refusing me

subtitles.original: 常闇に響き　刻むこの魔法　分からせてあげる
subtitles.english: Resonating in eternal darkness, this carving magic, I'll let you know

subtitles.original: ほら　悲鳴を聞かせてよ
subtitles.english: Now, let me hear your scream

subtitles.original: 夢見ないで　ほら聞かせて
subtitles.english: Don't dream, now let me hear it

subtitles.original: トワ様ー！
subtitles.english: Towa-sama!

subtitles.original: 来たぞー！
subtitles.english: I'm here!

subtitles.original: やべー、めっちゃ緊張してる。
subtitles.english: Oh man, I'm so nervous.

subtitles.original: やべー、はぁー...すごい...
subtitles.english: Oh man, phew... Amazing...

subtitles.original: みんなが目の前にいますよー！
subtitles.english: Everyone is right in front of me!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！見えてるー？みんなー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Can you see me? Everyone!

subtitles.original: やばい、緊張伝わった？
subtitles.english: Oh no, did my nervousness come across?

subtitles.original: あははは、やめて。
subtitles.english: Ahahaha, stop it.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、こんやっぴー、ホロライブ...
subtitles.english: All right, well then, Kon-yappi, Hololive...
